name: Juggernaut
description: You take 4 less damage per hit

name: Resilience
description: Reduce Crowd Control by 50%

name: Shelter
description: After being hit for more than 15% of your max HP, you cannot be hit again for more than 15% of your max HP for 3s. 50s CD

name: Sterilize
description: Reduce the duration of Damage Over Time effects on you by 15%

name: Exit Strategy
description: Exit combat 2s faster

name: Nimble
description: +20% Movement Speed

name: Bulldozer
description: Deal +150% damage to deployables

name: Cauterize
description: Your Weapon shots reduce your target's healing by 35% for 3s

name: Hamstring
description: Your Weapon attacks slow enemies by 15% for 2s

name: Thunderstruck
description: Hitting a stealth target with your weapon reveals it for 2s

name: Chronos
description: Reduce the Cooldown of your abilities by 10%

name: Morale Boost
description: Increase the rate at which you charge your ultimate by 20%

name: Big Game
description: Weapon shots deal bonus damage equal to 6% of your target's maximum Health

name: Wrecker
description: Your weapon attacks deal 100% increased damage to Shields

name: Gather
description: Picking up a HP Drop instantly restores 25% of your maximum Health

name: Blast Shields
description: Attacks you receive that deal over 500 damage are reduced by 35%

name: Deft Hands
description: Increase your reload speed by 50%

name: Develop
description: You increase your maximum Health by +75 each time you level up

name: Equestrian
description: Reduces the amount of time it takes to get on your mount by 50%

name: Forethought
description: Increase the amount of experience you get by 25%

name: Haven
description: Attacks that you receive that deal less than 75 damage are reduced by 35%

name: Hulking
description: Increase your maximum Health by 10%

name: Veteran
description: You heal an additional 4% of your max Health when out of combat

name: Life Rip
description: Your weapon shots gain +25% Lifesteal

name: Master Riding
description: Your mounting time is reduced, and you gain 20% Movement Speed while mounted

name: Illuminate
description: Increase the range at which you see nearby stealthed targets by 50%

name: Resuscitate
description: You respawn 50% faster

name: Blessed
description: All healing you receive is 30% more effective
